note.p: Scottish-born emigrant to Australia. Daughter of William Benton, blacksmith, and his wife Margaret Joss of Keig, Aberdeenshire. Married John Green in Keig in 1857. Emigrated to Australia in 1858; John Green became superintendent of Coranderrk Aboriginal Station. Supervised the care of orphans at Coranderrk, 1863–74. Supplied answers to CD’s queries on expression.
Giordano Nanni and Andrea James, Coranderrk: we will show the country (Canberra, ACT: Aboriginal Studies Press, 2013)
Scotland old parish registers births 205/20 49 Keig (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 5 September 2019)
